item.description: Meta Has Created A New Tool To Animate Your Child’s Drawings Using AI (1 minute read) Animated Drawings is a tool from Meta that can automatically animate drawings of human-like figures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-21
item.description: Lucid beats Tesla Model S Plaid prototype on racetrack with its own tri-motor Air test vehicle (2 minute read) Lucid has beaten the Tesla Model S Plaid prototype’s Laguna Seca race track record with its Air electric vehicle.
